name: __EClearSceneOptions
doc: Enumerates ways to clear a scene.

NoClear: This option is fastest but can cause artifacts unless you render to every pixel. Make sure to use a skybox with this option!
HardwareClear: Perform a full hardware clear before rendering. Most projects should use this option.
QuadAtMaxZ: Draws a quad to perform the clear at the far plane, this is faster than a hardware clear on some GPUs.
